body: The plot is all over the place, even for a hentai, this is just bad. The reason the girlfriend cheated on the MC is just too stupid and rushed. And I'll never understand why a sane man would ever consider sharing his women with other guys, seriously.

But if they make another please give a twist where he owns all the girls his ex and his girlfriend and the mom because that would be amazing like that’s ultimate fuck you revenge and W it’s like the jackpot six times

Here is my story he finds she asked someone to fuck he stops her and tells her don’t if want experience then let’s both gain from the person  we love she slowly gives in and and guy she asked he gets  told off and the MC pull his package and is happy she made that choice and   Year skip he married to her but she has idea her sister and them can all have sex next thing you know all
Married and having fun that is my story because I’m sorry but wtf like it’s the FMC fault I mean if I found my girl and a guy I would stop her right there and then slowly prepare for sex and make sure no guys try any shit with her and I say that in a dark tone
lol, no wonder the english are like mtl, its an Indonesian doujin. No wonder the story is ridiculously bland as well
Chapter 3.5 is out apparently, which gives the backstory to that bathroom scene looks like. Not on here as of yet, but it's been out since like June I think
"mato why?" Because she loves dick more than she loves him, obv, lol.
This was like watching a train wreck, I just can’t look away.

That had to be the mom that called Mato lol 9/10. Taking revenge to the next level and when that guy tried to interrupt Mato 🤣. She's mine, y'all can have her lmfao. Be happy that he didn't whoop your ass 🤣

we really need part 4 to clear some things up cause from what its implied it feels like Mai and MC were also dating and Mai probs betrayed him back then so he "punished" her with the gangrape. The evidence is in page 7 Mai says "besides your still holding your pain" and MC asks how did she know and she says "because your expression isnt the same as what you did back then" meaning she saw MCs expression when he punished her. Also on page 19 MC shows that expression and then we get flashback on Mai getting gang raped. The page 23 Mai says "of course how can i forget because at that time youve become the worst" Meaning he became broken the first time. My theory is thats why MC wanted to wait to marriage cause he had past trauma but then he gets betrayed yet again and he breaks 2nd time doing this. Also hope they throw in the mother in the future i bet it was her on the call.
Mother on last part maybe?!
wt is she still trying to say. that bitch really need's a mental hospital! and i mean it!
Waiting for part 4
So there might be a chapter 4 to this, Can't wait to see what happens next
"Mato why?" Bitch ruined his innocence and acting like she's the victim lol I love this story great job artist with this series ngl

Wtf did that girl expect? She literally went and fucked another guy just so "she can have experience" when it comes to having sex with the MC
She literally thought it was "normal" and ok
She had this coming stupid bitch

It seems the next chapter will focus on the past (mai and mc). Atleast that's a given from what hukii posted. Still wondering if that will be the whole chapter or half of it. Mom may get in there, and I'm also curious as to why mai had said her father would "come back" in chapter 1. It's so confussing yet intriguing.

This is the most confusing part so far. Like how he protects then discards the older sister. How can younger sister thinks he still cares about her? After what she did. And you think its the younger sister that made him evil but it was actually the older sister? Was he traumatized by it so didnt want to fuck younger sister before marriage? And the uniform is different. So was that middle school when MC watched older sister getting gangbanged? So who is he making the videos for? The boys he hired? The older sister? The mother? Hope the writer cleans up this issue at some point.

Perhaps he also have similar experience with that big sis?
Well well..

If the author decides to continue this one, I hope he goes all the way. Don't just turn the girls into sluts and give them what they want (sex). That would be too nice. Either break their hearts or their bones. One of the two. No "bittersweet" stuff.
Mato said: "New Rule: You can't touch this one  (referring to Mai)" but leaves him with them afterwards telling them they can do whatever they want.
hahahahahha Bro! so this MC was a real BASTARD  lmao he sold her girlfriend's sister and then his girlfriend hahahahaha
I hope mother's next
oh damn didnt think we were getting anothe part awesome
"Bittersweet" Peh...Yeah whatever. But why didn't your arts improved at all, author? Hell, it might looks even worse than his first work from a year ago. Kinda disappointed tbh.

Like how she looked all shocked when he said he didn’t care about her anymore, lol what did you expect he gave you all his heart and soul on that rooftop and you spit on it and stepped all over it when you let another dude fuck you. “Hear me out” what she gunna say I did it for us again

This took an interesting turn. For sure he knows the sister from before, since he was there when she was gangbanged. And probably it broke him inside for the 1st time. Then the gf broke him for sure, and he remembered all in this chapter. Can't wait for chapter 4, the mom should be there :v

The girl have it coming because she went behind his back to have sex with other student and they’re promising that they are going to get married after graduation in chapter one. My guess is this is his revenge since she wanted to experience sex. She got what she want it now and turns into a slut now.
"Don't touch this one." - "I'll leave these two to you." Hehe... Guess he changed his mind. Maybe on the way to fuck up mommy dearest?
Sweet. Never realized there was more.
Wait pages 21-24 suggest he was present at a gang rape of Mai's and looks to be in middle school judging by the uniforms so it was before he started dating Ayana.
So there's a third? I thought that 2nd installation ended with an implication of the girl getting gangbanged. Oh well, fappable is fappable.
